column4: Every time I try to convert to Linux, I fall over a showstopper hardware issue.  Today, it's wifi.  HP Elitebook vs Netgear N router. Just will NOT connect to the damn thing.  Worked great at the office all day on my Apple Airport though
anyone feel like sharing my pain?
lspci -> chipset of wifi card -> google
- lspci is a good start.  I couldn't remember the command, thanks.
